api

类 Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Card
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Class representing a playing card. Each card has a positive integer rank and a suit defined by the enumeration type Suit.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Card(int givenRank, Suit givenSuit)
      Constructs a card with the given rank and suit.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int compareTo(Card rhs)
      Orders cards by rank from highest to lowest, and within rank, by suit from highest (SPADES) to lowest (CLUBS).
      int compareToIgnoreSuit(Card rhs)
      Orders cards by rank from highest to lowest, ignoring suit.
      static Card[] createArray(java.lang.Integer... cards)
      Creates an array of cards from a variable-length list of integers representing their ranks.
      static Card[] createArray(java.lang.String cardString)
      Creates an array of cards from a string.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj) 
      int getRank()
      Returns the rank for this card.
      Suit getSuit()
      Returns the suit for this card.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a compact String representation of this card.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Card

        public Card(int givenRank,
    Suit givenSuit)
        Constructs a card with the given rank and suit. Ranks are integers greater than zero. A rank of 1 is special and is considered higher than any other rank.
        参数:
        givenRank - rank for this card
        givenSuit - suit for this card

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        Returns the rank for this card.
        返回:
        rank for this card

      • getSuit

        public Suit getSuit()
        Returns the suit for this card.
        返回:
        suit for this card

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a compact String representation of this card. Ranks of 1, 11, 12, and 13 are represented using the characters A, J, Q, and K respectively, and suits are represent as characters 'c', 'd', 'h', 's'. For example the ten of diamonds is "10d" and the queen of spades is "Qs". Ranks higher than 13 are represented numerically, e.g., "42h".
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card rhs)
        Orders cards by rank from highest to lowest, and within rank, by suit from highest (SPADES) to lowest (CLUBS).
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable<Card>

      • compareToIgnoreSuit

        public int compareToIgnoreSuit(Card rhs)
        Orders cards by rank from highest to lowest, ignoring suit.
        参数:
        rhs -
        返回:

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • createArray

        public static Card[] createArray(java.lang.Integer... cards)
        Creates an array of cards from a variable-length list of integers representing their ranks. All cards will have suit CLUBS.
        参数:
        cards - variable-length list of integer values
        返回:
        array of cards with the given ranks and suit CLUBS

      • createArray

        public static Card[] createArray(java.lang.String cardString)
        Creates an array of cards from a string. The string is a comma-separated list of rank and suit representations as described in toString. If no suit is given, the corresponding card will be clubs. If the string is not of the correct form, the method returns null.
        参数:
        cardString - comma-separated string of card representation
        返回:
        array of cards, or null if the string cannot be parsed
